main event: A pilot and co-pilot along with two crew members sighted an unidentified flying object while flying over California.
interesting points: The object appeared brilliant whitish yellow resembling fireworks, The object had a dripping and flaking off effect on its after portion, The estimated size of the object was about 125 feet long and 3 to 5 feet in diameter, The sighting lasted approximately 185 seconds, The crew lost sight of the object when they entered a cloud.
location: 500 mi W of California, California, USA
